text:
Created attachment 24097
FO

fo:inline in fo:block doesn't show right border.
creator: guillaume.levrero@free.fr

text: Seems to be something for those who know how hyphenation works. The effect only happens if hyphenation is enabled. It looks like notifyPos() is called from InlineStackingLayoutManager.applyChanges() which increases the lastGeneratedPosition (again) on the Position. And that should probably not happen or needs to be compensated somehow. I'm too tired to dive more deeply into this right now.
creator: jeremias@apache.org

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 49870 ***
